name: RAGMaster: Document Q&A Environment
description: Deploy a complete Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) environment that enables document question-answering. This template automates the setup of a vector database (for storing document embeddings), an embedding service using the Sentence Transformers 'all-MiniLM-L6-v2' model, and an LLM powered by 'mistralai/Mistral-7B-Instruct-v0.2' to generate accurate and context‚Äêdriven answers.
